column4: a few seconds ago the most bizarre thing happened. some friend send me a url of a .iso though msn protocol and pidgin. i clicked it assuming it will open firefox and it will start downloading. but it opened k3b and it tried saving it to /tmp and then recording it to the drive!
why did it do that? last time it opened an image in eog the same way
lol. i need to mdsum it first and test it in vbox
